name: Please Follow The Rules
description:
A game Jam submission for AI and Games Jam 2021

I wanted to make a simple small scoped game using the theme "Break the rules" and a basic A* pathfinding system to create an enemy, as well as using string lists for the narrative system, and Enums for Narrative states,  AI is a subject rarely touched or studied so this was playing about with some of the stuff learned, so the AI in this is very poor and basic and isn't even a big focus of the game, but I still wanted to include it to the narrative.

Whilst the Game Jam does last a week, I wanted to only spend a day or two on this project to continue other things (to be honest, sign up was a spur of the moment last-second thing, and didn't know if I would even be able to make anything, but I tried!)

Hope you enjoy it.

Made by Anthony Brame (Ants64)
